Hotels in Santa Barbara, CA

Santa Barbara, the epitome of the American Riviera, is a city that effortlessly marries the elegance of Spanish colonial architecture with the relaxed ambiance of a beach town. Its natural beauty, ranging from the pristine beaches to the breathtaking Santa Ynez Mountains, is simply unparalleled. Whether you're meandering through the charming downtown area, discovering the rich history of the Santa Barbara Mission, or immersing yourself in the vibrant arts and culture scene, there's something to captivate every visitor. The hotels of Marriott Bonvoy in Santa Barbara are strategically located to serve as your perfect retreat, offering amenities designed to enhance your comfort and enjoyment during your stay.

A stay at a Marriott Bonvoy hotel in Santa Barbara places you within reach of the city’s celebrated wine country, lively farmer’s markets, and a variety of dining experiences. Many of our hotels are located near popular attractions such as Stearns Wharf, the Santa Barbara Zoo, and the historic Presidio. Whether you're visiting for a romantic retreat, a family vacation, or a business trip, our properties offer the services you need and the locations you want, ensuring that your time in Santa Barbara is nothing short of exceptional.

Explore Santa Barbara

Check out our travel tips before booking your hotel.

Nature

Culture

Climate

Transport

Kids

For those who appreciate the great outdoors, Santa Barbara is a dream come true. The city's coastline is a vision of beauty, complemented by the majestic mountains that serve as a backdrop. A short boat ride to the Channel Islands National Park presents a unique opportunity to explore five untouched islands, each with its own network of trails, wildlife, and breathtaking vistas. For a more serene adventure, the Santa Barbara Botanic Garden is a haven of peace, with its indigenous plants and meandering paths offering a perfect escape. The city's beaches, from East Beach to Arroyo Burro Beach, are ideal for sunbathing, swimming, and beachcombing, while the more adventurous can try their hand at surfing or paddleboarding.

If you're more of a hill person, the Los Padres National Forest is a stone's throw away, with a vast trail network for hikers, bikers, and equestrians. Its landscape, from chaparral to oak woodlands, is a scenic playground. In town, the Alice Keck Park Memorial Garden is a local secret, ideal for a tranquil bird-watching and picnic spot. Whether you're after a day of beachside bliss or a mountain trail adventure, Santa Barbara's natural charm is bound to captivate and energize you.
This page uses AI-generated content, which may contain inaccuracies. Please verify key details as needed. 
Santa Barbara's allure lies in its seamless fusion of Spanish colonial heritage and a relaxed coastal ambiance, creating a destination that is both distinctive and delightful. A stay at one of our Santa Barbara hotels is an invitation to immerse yourself in the city's rich tapestry, from the grandeur of the Mission Santa Barbara to the time-honored El Paseo district, where art galleries, boutiques, and eateries are nestled in historic adobe structures. Our hotels are the perfect launchpad to explore the city's dynamic arts scene, with convenient proximity to the Santa Barbara Museum of Art and the vibrant Funk Zone, renowned for its mix of galleries, tasting rooms, and creative spaces.

Santa Barbara’s commitment to sustainability and the arts is evident in the city’s many festivals and events. The Santa Barbara International Film Festival and the Summer Solstice Celebration are just two examples of the many events that bring the community together to celebrate film, music, and the environment. After a day of exploring the city’s cultural offerings, return to your Marriott Bonvoy hotel and relax in the comfort of your guest room or suite. Many of our hotels offer amenities such as outdoor pools, beautiful gardens, and on-site dining that capture the essence of this sun-soaked city.
This page uses AI-generated content, which may contain inaccuracies. Please verify key details as needed. 
With its Mediterranean climate, Santa Barbara is a year-round destination, offering warm, dry summers and mild, wet winters. From June through August, the city sees plenty of sunshine and temperatures in the 70s to 80s, providing the perfect conditions for beach days and outdoor adventures. While the mornings may start with a marine layer, it typically burns off by midday, leaving you with the ideal weather to explore. Our Marriott Bonvoy hotels in Santa Barbara offer a variety of amenities, including pools and beachfront access, so you can make the most of the summer sun.

Santa Barbara's winters, from December to February, are mild and enjoyable, with daytime temperatures hovering around 60 and nighttime temperatures dropping to around 40. This season brings more rain, which helps keep the city's landscapes green and vibrant. Spring and fall, from March to May and September to November, respectively, are characterized by beautiful, temperate weather with temperatures in the 60s to 70s. These seasons are perfect for exploring the city's many parks, gardens and coastal trails, as well as attending festivals and events. Marriott Bonvoy hotels are conveniently located to provide easy access to all of Santa Barbara's seasonal highlights, ensuring a memorable visit no matter when you come.
This page uses AI-generated content, which may contain inaccuracies. Please verify key details as needed. 
When you visit Santa Barbara, you have a wealth of transportation options to choose from, ensuring that getting around the city is both convenient and enjoyable. Santa Barbara Airport is a popular entry point, offering flights from major hubs and connecting travelers to the heart of the city via taxis, ride-sharing services, and the Santa Barbara Airporter shuttle. For those arriving by land, the city is accessible via Amtrak and Greyhound, with stations centrally located. Driving into Santa Barbara is also a breeze, thanks to the well-maintained coastal highways and scenic routes.

Once in Santa Barbara, you'll find a variety of transportation options to help you explore the city. The Santa Barbara Metropolitan Transit District (MTD) offers an extensive network of bus routes that can take you to the beach, downtown, and other popular areas and attractions. Taxis and ride-sharing services like Uber and Lyft are also available for a more direct route. Many travelers also choose to rent a car, with several rental agencies located at the airport and throughout the city. Santa Barbara's compact and walkable downtown area makes it easy to explore local shops, restaurants, and attractions on foot, and many of our Marriott Bonvoy properties are located in prime areas for walking. Whether you're planning a leisurely stroll or a more adventurous day trip, Santa Barbara has a transportation option to fit your needs.
This page uses AI-generated content, which may contain inaccuracies. Please verify key details as needed. 
Santa Barbara is a haven for families seeking to craft cherished memories. Begin your journey at the Santa Barbara Zoo, where your little ones can marvel at over 500 animals, from the playful otters to the majestic giraffes, and even partake in the Junior Zoologist Program. Then, for some beachside fun, make your way to Leadbetter Beach, where the gentle waves and powdery sand are an invitation to build sandcastles and paddle in the shallows. The beachfront also boasts a playground, ensuring hours of entertainment for your children.

For a blend of fun and education, the Santa Barbara Museum of Natural History is a must-see, with its interactive exhibits like the Dinosaur Hall and the sea life touch tank. The Ty Warner Sea Center is another great place for kids to learn about marine life, with its hands-on activities and educational programs. In the evening, take the family to the Arlington Theatre for a movie under the stars, or enjoy a peaceful walk through the Santa Barbara Botanic Garden, where you’ll find nature trails and picnic areas.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is Marriott Bonvoy Offers™?

Looking for unbeatable hotel deals? Discover exclusive offers at over 30 hotel brands and 10,000 global destinations within the Marriott Bonvoy Offers Hub.

How can I find the best hotel discounts?

for access to exclusive member rates and benefits at participating properties worldwide.
Join Marriott Bonvoy® 
How do I redeem an offer?

To redeem a stay-based offer, complete a reservation using the correct Promotional Code (if applicable) with the necessary stay requirements that can be found within the offer landing page. Each offer has unique requirements, so please be sure to review all necessary details and terms and conditions before completing a reservation. To redeem a non-stay-based offer, please follow the instructions on the offer landing page.

What are Member Exclusive offers?

Member Exclusive Offers are offers only available to Marriott Bonvoy members. Members must be signed in to their Marriott Bonvoy account to take advantage of Member Exclusive Offers. Not yet a member?  today to unlock access to exclusive offers including member rates, bonus points, travel & dining packages, and more. Plus, as a Marriott Bonvoy member, you can enjoy special benefits such as complimentary Wi-Fi and earning points on stays.
Join Marriott Bonvoy 
What are Elite Exclusive offers?

Elite Exclusive Offers are offers only available to Marriott Bonvoy Elite members, ranging from Silver Elite and above, Gold Elite and above, and Platinum Elite and above. Marriott Bonvoy Elite members must be logged into their Marriott Bonvoy accounts to take advantage of Elite Exclusive Offers. Each Elite Exclusive Offer is different, so be sure to read through the offer details and terms & conditions on the offer landing page for the full details.

What are Bonus Point offers?

Bonus Point offers are Member Exclusive Offers or Elite Exclusive Offers that include bonus points for eligible stays or other actions such as dining. Bonus points for stay-based offers can be awarded on a per night or per stay basis. Bonus points may be deposited up to 10 business days after check-out. Be sure to read through the offer details and terms & conditions on the offer landing page for the full details.
